messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Um, that's, uh, what is this, like 1-10 Grady Avenue.
It's behind the Taylor Grady House, at the Town and Gown's theater. A man just walked up and there were several gunshots.
Okay, sir, stay with me, okay?
You said this happened at the Taylor Grady House?
Yes, it happened there.
Okay, on Prince Avenue?
Yes, sir.
So someone started shooting off a gun at the Taylor Grady House, is that right?
Sir, listen to me. I need you to stay with me.
Okay, yes.
I've got several other people calling. Listen, stay with me.
What does this guy look like?
I don't know. I didn't see him.
Okay, you didn't see him? You just heard the shots?
Yeah, I was there, and he shot three people.
He shot three people?
Yes. Two gunshots to one man. It looks like one to the chest and another, and I think one to the chest.
Okay, where is this guy now? Where did he go?
Did anybody see where he ran? I need a description: white guy, black guy?
Yeah, white guy.
Anybody have a description, does anybody see what he looks like?
Tell them if they're calling 911, they need to hang up and just tell you what's going on first.
I need a description of the guy right now. White male, black male, Hispanic male, quickly.
White male, white male.
Okay, about how old? Can anybody describe what he looks like?
I didn't see him. Here, hold on.
White male, 50s, goatee, beard, wearing blue shorts and a t-shirt.
Which way did he go?
He headed towards Prince Avenue, away from downtown.
Are you talking to an officer?
Yes, sir.
Go ahead and talk to him. Thank you.
Okay, thank you.
